results.question: In the 1988 film "Akira", Tetsuo ends up destroying Tokyo.
The programming language "Python" is based off a modified version of "JavaScript".
Alaska is the largest state in the United States.
Studio Ghibli is a Japanese animation studio responsible for the films "Wolf Children" and "The Boy and the Beast".
In Splatoon, the Squid Sisters are named Tako and Yaki.
An exothermic reaction is a chemical reaction that releases energy by radiating electricity.
"PAYDAY: The Heist" is a sequel to the board game "Payday".
In the "S.T.A.L.K.E.R." series, the Freedom faction wishes to destroy the supernatural area known as  "the Zone".
In "Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed", the player can only drive cars manufactured by Porsche.
